languages.text: "Он не отступался от веры в Омниссию. Он отступился от императивов древних. Но мудрость благословенного Амарната была столь очевидна, что заставляла многих усомниться в догматах вслед за ним". {n}Голос {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-системы наполняется разрозненными статическими шумами, перекрывающими речь техножреца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Он не отступался от веры в Омниссию. Он отступился от императивов древних. Но мудрость благословенного Амарната была столь очевидна, что заставляла многих усомниться в догматах вслед за ним". {n}Голос {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-системы наполняется разрозненными статическими шумами, перекрывающими речь техножреца.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "He did not abandon his faith in the Omnissiah. He deviated from the ancient imperatives. But the wisdom of the blessed Amarnat was so obvious, it made many others doubt the dogmas and follow his lead." {n}The voice coming from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system fills with static noise that drowns out the Tech-Priest's words.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Он не отступался от веры в Омниссию. Он отступился от императивов древних. Но мудрость благословенного Амарната была столь очевидна, что заставляла многих усомниться в догматах вслед за ним". {n}Голос {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-системы наполняется разрозненными статическими шумами, перекрывающими речь техножреца.{/n}

But the wisdom of the blessed Amarnat was so obvious, it made many others doubt the dogmas and follow his lead." {n}The voice coming from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system fills with static noise that drowns out the Tech-Priest's words.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “他并没有背弃对欧姆尼塞亚的信仰。尽管他偏离了自古以来的教条，但蒙福者阿玛纳特充满了智慧，以致于许多人都开始怀疑以往的教条，追随他的脚步。”{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统中传来的声音充满了静态噪音，淹没了这位技术神甫的话语。{/n}
languages.original_text: "He did not abandon his faith in the Omnissiah. He deviated from the ancient imperatives. But the wisdom of the blessed Amarnat was so obvious, it made many others doubt the dogmas and follow his lead." {n}The voice coming from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system fills with static noise that drowns out the Tech-Priest's words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “他并没有背弃对欧姆尼塞亚的信仰。尽管他偏离了自古以来的教条，但蒙福者阿玛纳特充满了智慧，以致于许多人都开始怀疑以往的教条，追随他的脚步。”{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统中传来的声音充满了静态噪音，淹没了这位技术祭司的话语。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «No abandonó su fe en el Omnissiah. Se desvió de los antiguos imperativos, pero la sabiduría del bendito Amarnat era tan evidente que hizo que muchos dudaran de los dogmas para seguir sus pasos». {n}La voz que emite el sistema de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} se llena con estática que ahoga las palabras del tecnosacerdote.{/n}
languages.original_text: "He did not abandon his faith in the Omnissiah. He deviated from the ancient imperatives. But the wisdom of the blessed Amarnat was so obvious, it made many others doubt the dogmas and follow his lead." {n}The voice coming from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system fills with static noise that drowns out the Tech-Priest's words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No abandonó su fe en el Omnissiah. Se desvió de los antiguos imperativos, pero la sabiduría del bendito Amarnat era tan evidente que hizo que muchos dudaran de los dogmas para seguir sus pasos». {n}La voz que emite el sistema de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} se llena con estática que ahoga las palabras del tecnosacerdote.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「彼は万機神への信仰を捨てなかった。彼は古代の命令から逸脱した。しかし、アマルナトの叡智はあまりにも明白であったため、多くの者がドグマを疑い、彼に従うようになったのだ」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}・システムから聞こえてくる声は、技術司祭の言葉をかき消すようなノイズ音で満たされている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "He did not abandon his faith in the Omnissiah. He deviated from the ancient imperatives. But the wisdom of the blessed Amarnat was so obvious, it made many others doubt the dogmas and follow his lead." {n}The voice coming from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system fills with static noise that drowns out the Tech-Priest's words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「彼は万機神への信仰を捨てなかった。彼は古代の命令から逸脱した。しかし、アマルナトの叡智はあまりにも明白であったため、多くの者がドグマを疑い、彼に従うようになったのだ」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}・システムから聞こえてくる声は、技術司祭の言葉をかき消すようなノイズ音で満たされている。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Er hat seinen Glauben an den Omnissiah nicht aufgegeben. Er ist von den uralten Geboten abgewichen. Doch die Weisheit des gesegneten Amarnat war so offenkundig, dass viele andere anfingen, an den Dogmen zu zweifeln und ihm zu folgen." {n}Die Stimme aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voxsystem{/g} füllt sich mit Rauschen, das die Worte des Techpriesters übertönt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "He did not abandon his faith in the Omnissiah. He deviated from the ancient imperatives. But the wisdom of the blessed Amarnat was so obvious, it made many others doubt the dogmas and follow his lead." {n}The voice coming from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system fills with static noise that drowns out the Tech-Priest's words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Er hat seinen Glauben an den Omnissiah nicht aufgegeben. Er ist von den uralten Geboten abgewichen. Doch die Weisheit des gesegneten Amarnat war so offenkundig, dass viele andere anfingen, an den Dogmen zu zweifeln und ihm zu folgen." {n}Die Stimme aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voxsystem{/g} füllt sich mit Rauschen, das die Worte des Techpriesters übertönt.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Il n'a pas rejeté sa foi en l'Omnimessie, il s'est simplement éloigné des impératifs archaïques. Mais la sagesse d'Amarnat le béni était si évidente que bien des gens ont commencé à remettre les dogmes en question et à le suivre. » {n}Des parasites viennent brouiller la voix qui émane du système-{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}, masquant les mots du technoprêtre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "He did not abandon his faith in the Omnissiah. He deviated from the ancient imperatives. But the wisdom of the blessed Amarnat was so obvious, it made many others doubt the dogmas and follow his lead." {n}The voice coming from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system fills with static noise that drowns out the Tech-Priest's words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Il n'a pas rejeté sa foi en l'Omnimessie, il s'est simplement éloigné des impératifs archaïques. Mais la sagesse d'Amarnat le béni était si évidente que bien des gens ont commencé à remettre les dogmes en question et à le suivre. » {n}Des parasites viennent brouiller la voix qui émane du système-{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}, masquant les mots du technoprêtre.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "He did not abandon his faith in the Omnissiah. He deviated from the ancient imperatives. But the wisdom of the blessed Amarnat was so obvious, it made many others doubt the dogmas and follow his lead." {n}The voice coming from the vox-system fills with static noise that drowns out the Tech-Priest's words.{/n}

languages.text: "Hermesih'e olan inancını terk etmiş değildi. Kadim buyruklardan uzaklaşmıştı. Kutsanmış Amarnat'ın bilge olduğu ise açıktı. Birçoklarının dogmalardan şüphe etmesini ve kendisini takip etmesini sağladı." {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voks{/g} sisteminden gelen parazit dolu ses, Tekno Rahip'in sözlerini boğuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "He did not abandon his faith in the Omnissiah. He deviated from the ancient imperatives. But the wisdom of the blessed Amarnat was so obvious, it made many others doubt the dogmas and follow his lead." {n}The voice coming from the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system fills with static noise that drowns out the Tech-Priest's words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hermesih'e olan inancını terk etmiş değildi. Kadim buyruklardan uzaklaştı. Kutsanmış Amarnat'ın bilge bir kişi olduğu açıktı ama. Birçoklarının dogmalardan şüpheye düşmesini ve kendisini takip etmesini sağladı." {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voks{/g} sisteminden gelen parazit dolu ses, Tekno Rahip'in sözlerini boğuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
